animeTitle: McDull: Xiang Dang Dang Ban Wo Xin
animeDescription: Hong-Kong made fourth sequel of "My Life as McDull".Springfield Kindergarten is desperately in need of money - The principal is behind on the rent, and the electricity is getting cut off. After a fundraising dinner ends in spectacular failure, the music-loving principal decides to form a student choir as last resort. With the help of a shady talent manager named Big M, the Springfield Kindergarten Choir becomes a huge success, and little McDull discovers that a little thickness really can make a great voice. (Source: AniDB)
animeRelated: ['Prequel: McDull: Xiang Dang Dang', 'Sequel: McDull: Wo He Wo Mama']
